abstracts.cdata!:
The First Education Project will consist
            of the establishment of (i) a teacher training center in
            Moundou providing for an enrollment of 400 full-time
            students, (ii) a training center for agricultural
            technicians at Fort Lamy with a capacity of 120 students,
            and (iii) technical assistance in the form of teaching
            personnel for the two centers which would be provided by FAC.
